ai-patthana13.5:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, namely, Tissaka,
ai-patthana13.5:1.1_0: corruption, conditions don’t give rise to thoughts, and conditions.
ai-patthana13.5:1.1_1: corruption, conditions give rise to the corruption of defiledness.
ai-patthana13.5:1.1_2: corruption, conditions don’t give rise to corruption, or cruelty.
ai-patthana13.5:1.1_3: thoughts that are defiled and corrupted, and are not defiled by defiled, nor are their conditions for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana13.5:1.1_4: thoughts that are defiled and corrupted, and are not defiled by defiled, nor are their conditions for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana13.5:2.1_0: Avoiding corruption about defiledness, without defilement, conditions, and with the thought that gives rise to defilements.
ai-patthana13.5:2.1_1: Not corruption, conditions give rise to the corruption of defilement and defilement.
ai-patthana13.5:2.1_2: thoughts that are not defiled and defiled, and are not connected with the defilements.
ai-patthana13.5:3.1_0: Rather, corruption, gives rise to the thought of defiling, and dependently originated.
ai-patthana13.5:3.1_1: Not corruption, conditions give rise to the corruption of defilement and defilement.
ai-patthana13.5:3.1_2: Not corruption, conditions give rise to the corruption of defilement and defilement.
ai-patthana13.5:3.1_3: thoughts that are not defiled and defiled, and are not connected with the defilements.
ai-patthana13.5:3.1_4: thoughts that are not defiled and defiled, and are not connected with the defilements.
ai-patthana13.5:5.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.5:6.1_2: What is not the ignorant fools?
ai-patthana13.5:6.1_3: or government officials and requisites associated with them, even if they’re in the same place as before.
ai-patthana13.5:7.1_1: From the eighth day of the lakes, nine orifices each other, and six classes of rebirth ...
ai-patthana13.5:7.1_2: these nineteenth sections are associated with (wholesome) associated with the donors.
